content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) FROM cards c JOIN legalities l ON c.uuid = l.uuid WHERE l.status = 'Restricted' AND c.isTextless = 0;"
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT l.status FROM legalities l LIMIT 10;"
